SEARCH
Package com.example.eventlottery.fragments

Class EventHistoryFragment

java.lang.Object
androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
com.example.eventlottery.fragments.EventHistoryFragment
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, androidx.activity.result.ActivityResultCaller, androidx.lifecycle.HasDefaultViewModelProviderFactory, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner
public class EventHistoryFragment extends androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
EventHistoryFragment - Displays user's event history in three tabs PENDING: Events user is waitlisted for or has pending lottery selection WON: Events user won and accepted LOST: Events user lost or declined
